item.description:
The Blue Ocean Society for Marine Conservation's Annual Tropical Sunset Cruise aboard the M/V Prince of Whales out of Newburyport!
Join us for our annual summer bash on the Merrimack, featuring DJ Ron Reid, tropical tunes and a calm river cruise!
7:00-9:30 PM
Advance Tickets: $20 for Non-members / $15 for Blue Ocean Society Members
Tickets: $25 at the boat on the evening of the cruise

This is a good time for a good cause! It's summer get out and relax after a hard day at work!
You will be responsible for your own ticket as you can see if you buy them in advance you save!
The web site is below.

Blue Ocean Society
item.how_to_find_us: I will be on the dock in front of the boat at 6:30PM
item.name: Blue Ocean Society for Marine Conservation Annual Tropical Sunset Cruise
